hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD0$ hundreds, $\purpleD7$ tens, and $\purpleD4$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{74}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c941207aaa9c710c716e5a188099cef1d40aa346)

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ hundreds, $\maroonD0$ tens, and $\maroonD5$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{205}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/20458466d678e823ecfcffc329bb20c21ef34d3e)

Together, there are $\blueE2$ hundreds, $\blueE7$ tens, and $\blueE9$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b6b3e9a5ab6ea804460f064fec5b3fe4d786e5da)

$200 + 70 + 9 =\blueE{279}$

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleE{74} + \maroonD{205} = \blueE{279}$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented by the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/eff0bfe8cc1010939ae63389fc1d3aadeabc395c)

[[☃ radio 1]]
